issue.title: [C++] AllocateBitmap() with out parameter is declared but not defined
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18343](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18343). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[This variant of AllocateBitmap](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/buffer.h#L483) is declared but not defined in buffer.cc.
